WRITING.TEXT: That spot is apparently really popular now, thanks to the movie.

WRITING.TITLE: The Endless Summer.
WRITING.TEXT:
I don't think I have ever watched a chiller movie. The dry humor of the narrator fits perfectly. You get to experience other cultures and locations around the world. I just think the movie should be studied as how to make something laid back. The music, the people, the story, The Endless Summer.
Enough Said. Just go watch it and wind down.

WRITING.TITLE: About to get really high and watch Tron:Legacy
WRITING.TEXT: It's gonna be a good Tuesday.

WRITING.TITLE: What are some actually good lines of dialogue from the Star Wars prequels?
WRITING.TEXT: All I see is hate and anger towards the dialogue,but there must be some light for these films.
